name: Escape (itch) (JamesKey)
description:
Escape,

is a 64x64 pixel game created for LOWREZJAM '22.

The game is essentially an escape room, utilising the optional `Block` theme, for minimalistic graphics using solic blocks of colour! Waking up in an unknown house, where are you? And more importantly, how do you get out?

Controls:

  • [WASD]  -  Move
  • [E]  -  Interact
---

Escape, is powered by Phaser, and written in Typescript.

All assets, minus the Phaser Logo are original creations.
